org.kaaproject.kaa.common.endpoint.security

Class KeyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.endpoint.security.KeyUtil

  • public abstract class KeyUtil
extends Object
    The Class KeyUtil is used to persist and fetch Public and Private Keys.
    Author:
    Andrew Shvayka
